content: keep your head warm a winter with this easy crochet ribbed hat this ribbed crochet hat pattern is simple to follow with basic construction that will allow you to make a gorgeous hat in no time instantly download the pattern and start crocheting today skill level easy hook size us size 7 4 5 mm crochet hook yarn category 3 light weight yarn main stitches chain half_double_crochet the pattern uses us crochet terms and is available only in english please note that this pattern is available for free on stitching-together com the benefit of purchasing this pdf is an easy to read printable and ad-free version of the pattern 1 1 https //www stitching-together com/easy-crochet-ribbed-hat-free-pattern/
